## HeadersInit type

HTTP headers from which to construct a [Headers](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/Headers) object.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type HeadersInit = [string, string][] | Record<string, string> | Headers;
```
